titleStmt.title: The last speech of Mr. David Lewis, priest of the Society of Jesus, who was executed as a priest only, at Uske in Monmouth-shire, on the 27th day of August, anno Domini 1679
titleStmt.author: Lewis, David, Saint, 1617-1679.

notesStmt.note: This item can also be found at reel 719:9 bound with "A narrative of the imprisonment and tryal of Mr. David Lewis."
Reproduction of original in the Library of Congress and Huntington Library.
